message: Let's be fair, but I'm taking the lion's share. You get a thousand, I get the rest. Accept and let's move on.
You're being too greedy! I'll give you a decent chunk, but don't expect me to be generous.
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 90/10, and call it a day.
You're not being realistic. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but you need to meet me in the middle.
I'm getting a bit tired of this back and forth. Let's meet in the middle and split it 85/15.  It's a fair deal, considering the inflation we've both experienced.
I'm not going to get taken advantage of. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up all the power.
